message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. Can we agree on this price?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  How about we split the difference between our last two offers and settle at $12,250? This feels like a fair deal to me.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again at $11,500. Can we agree on this price?
